      • addItemTemplate

        public void addItemTemplate(java.lang.Class<? extends Item> itemClass,
                            java.lang.Class<?>[] parameterTypes,
                            java.lang.Object[] parameterValues,
                            int minItems,
                            int maxItems,
                            int probability)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a generic item type with parameter values. Used as a template for the specific item type.
        Parameters:
        itemClass - the item class to use. Must be of type Item.
        parameterTypes - an array of parameter types for Item class.
        parameterValues - an array of parameter values for Item class.
        minItems - minimum amount of items in room
        maxItems - maximum amount of items in room
        probability - the probability to create this item
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if roomspaace is invalid or the number of parameters or value in parameterTypes or parameterValues is wrong.

      • addEnemyTemplate

        public void addEnemyTemplate(java.lang.Class<? extends Character> enemyClass,
                             java.lang.Class<?>[] parameterTypes,
                             java.lang.Object[] parameterValues,
                             IO io,
                             int minEnemies,
                             int maxEnemies,
                             int probability)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a generic enemy type with parameter values. Used as a template for the specific item type.
        Parameters:
        enemyClass - the item class to use. Must be of type Item.
        parameterTypes - an array of parameter types for Item class.
        parameterValues - an array of parameter values for Item class.
        io - the io to use for the item type
        minEnemies - minimum amount of enemies in a room
        maxEnemies - maximum amount of enemies in a room
        probability - the probability to create this enemy
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if io is null or the number of parameters or value in parameterTypes or parameterValues is wrong.
